abstract: SABMiller’s bid for Foster’s moved a step forward on Wednesday as an Australian regulator said the acquisition was not likely to lessen competition in the beer industry.
snippet: SABMiller’s bid for Foster’s moved a step forward on Wednesday as an Australian regulator said the acquisition was not likely to lessen competition in the beer industry.
lead_paragraph: SABMiller’s bid for Foster’s moved a step forward on Wednesday as an Australian regulator said the acquisition would not hurt competition in the beer industry.

headline.main: SABMiller Deal for Foster’s Clears Hurdle
